verbs.description: [ARG0: All of Trumps] [V: dictating] and renegotiating is supposed to protect American jobs from the menace of NAFTA , which according to one of its ardent critics destroyed 1 million U.S. jobs in its first 20 years ( 1994 - 2014 ) .
